document.full_text: somalia's u.n.-backed government said sunday it planned to postpone elections to next year, saying it had to tackle insecurity first, further deepening its dispute with parliament.
document.title: somalia postpones vote to 2012 amid security crisis
lines_and_colors: somalia's u.n.-backed government said sunday it planned to postpone elections to next year, saying it had to tackle insecurity first, further deepening its dispute with parliament.
